messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] leaky memory was Re: Just a few Big Macs
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/15/2004 10:54:23 AM Central Standard Time, danielle.conger@comcast.net writes: binary ~~~ I have been trying to think of this word ever
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/15/2004 10:54:23 AM Central Standard Time,
danielle.conger@... writes:

binary


~~~
I have been trying to think of this word ever since Will and I bought _Enter
the Matrix_ for PS2 last Wednesday. It's not a word I've used much since
the early '80s.

It's strange how things are coincidental like that. Thanks for using it.
Now I can turn off that back burner that was simmering a little too high for
comfort.

Karen


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
